properties.entry: INSERT INTO sc_suggest ( TITLE, MEMO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, TYPE ) VALUES ( '{@#title#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#type#}' )

UPDATE sc_suggest SET TITLE = '{@#title#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' , TYPE = '{@#type#}' , {@ STATUS = '#status#' , } UPDATOR = '{@#loginId#}' , UPDATE_TIME = NOW()
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
